body.name: Yaheetech Managerial Executive Chairs Office Task Chair Mid-Back PU Leather Ergonomic Computer Desk Chair w/Lumbar Support Swivel Wheels Thick Padding Seat for Home Office, Black
deliveryMessages: $19.99 delivery Friday, February 16. Order within 6 hrs 6 mins.
features: 【MADE FOR COMFORT】: The faux leather upholstered back and seat come stuffed with a foam fill, which helps to relieve fatigue from a long time sitting. The curve back offers extra support for your lower back. Foam-padded arms give you hours of comfort.
【SEAT HEIGHT ADJUSTABLE】: The SGS-Certified pneumatic cylinder will allow you to easily adjust the seat from 46cm/18’’ to 56cm/22’’ by a simple pull at the lever.

【FREE MOBILITY】: The 360° swivel seat and wheels provide must-have mobility in your office, making sure you can move freely and smoothly as you rush from task to task, so not even your workflow can stop you.

【COMPETITIVE QUALITY】: For the back and seat we apply quality PU leather upholstered fire retardant foam cushioning, and antirust chrome-plated steel for the arm and star base. This sturdy office chair with carefully selected materials has been tested to hold up to 130kg/287 pounds.

【ROCKING & TILTING】: The tilt-lock mechanism gives you a more comfortable rocking/reclining option other than to sit up straight. You can switch the two modes by simply pulling/pushing the lever to unlock/lock the mechanism. Twist the control knob to adjust the tilt tension of the chair.
body.description: Specifications Color: BlackMaterial: PU leather, plywood, foam, chrome plated steelOverall dimension: 24.2 x 23.6 x (36.6-40.6)’’ (LxWxH)Back size: 19 x 23.4’’ (WxH)Seat size: 19 x 18’’ (WxD)Seat height: 18-22’’Maximum capacity: 287lbG.W.: 30.5lb Believe it or not, a comfortable office chair is fundamental for a productive workday. A desk chair like this is an ideal option for getting comfy sitting experience, while also introducing an on-trend contemporary look. We apply quality PU leather upholstered fire retardant foam cushioning for the seat and back, and antirust chrome-plated steel for the arm and star base. Twisting and turning about is integral within the office and best optimal desk use. The 360° swivel seat and wheels of this mid-back office chair ensure the must-have mobility. And with the tilt-lock mechanism and seat height adjustment, you can customize your seat to your preference.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 19, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Well worth the money.
reviews.reviewText: Great chair, cute and functional. Very easy to put together. Very comfortable also

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 26, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Love the look of this office chair!
reviews.reviewText: Great quality. Easy to assemble. Chair is just as advertised.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on April 24, 2021
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars It looks great!
reviews.reviewText: I would say I like that it came on time. That the chair is comfy and looks fancy. Most of the chair was easy to put together but the arm rest will look off like it wont fit but you just gotta give it a streatch type of thing and boom it fits. The arm rest for me as you can see looks a bit off color but it had it on both sides and on one side i washed it with soap and it was back to normal so i think its just the tape rap. Overall im not that picky sooo this works just fine for me. I really like.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 20, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Cute and comfy
reviews.reviewText: Love this chair very cute.I only sit in chair a little so I cannot say how comfortable it is for a long period of siting,but when I occasionally sit in chairs comfortable.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 16, 2024
reviews.reviewText: I loved this chair so much! For the price it’s definitely a steal lol. So comfortable. Clear instructions. Came in on time. love love love it!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 2, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars READ THIS BEFORE BUYING
reviews.reviewText: If you follow the assembly instructions exactly, you will think the holes for the back were drilled in the wrong space. I found out that it is easier to deviate from the instructions in the following way and the chair goes together very easily. BEFORE installing the adjustment base, line up the two forward holes for the back and start the screws, tightening them about halfway. The metal flexes enough to line the holes up, then you can install the other two screws for the back. Leave all four screws only tightened about halfway. THEN install the adjustment base so that it overlaps the front part of the metal plate for the back. Screw all four screws in for the adjustment base at this point, then tighten the screws for the back the rest of the way.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 27, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars What a steal!
reviews.reviewText: I purchased this chair for my kids as a desk/gaming chair, because I liked the way it looked and it was priced right - but when I easily put the chair together, and sat in it I new I made a good purchase! My son loved it and the other boys wanted one just like it, so I ordered 2 more.
